section.title: FIFO Interface
section.para: The number of allowed requests per interval as well as the interval length itself can be modified over the FIFO interface of SER. In addition rate limiting statistics are provided upon request.

listitem.para: rl.stats - Get current per request limits as well as current load levels for all request types.
rl.invite_limit - Set the number of allowed INVITE requests per interval to the given value as the sole parameter. A limit of 0 turns of rate limiting of INVITE messages.
rl.register_limit - Set the number of allowed REGISTER requests per interval to the given value as the sole parameter. A limit of 0 turns of rate limiting of REGISTER messages.
rl.subscribe_limit - Set the number of allowed SUBSCRIBE requests per interval to the given value as the sole parameter. A limit of 0 turns of rate limiting of SUBSCRIBE messages.
